name: roy-replicator
description: Node implementation of CouchDB replicator, based on nano. For educational purposes.

scripts.jshint: jshint -c .jshintrc lib/*.js lib/replicate/*.js test/lib/prepare/*.js lib/prepare/*.js roy.js test/lib/replicate/*.js test/lib/*.js test/*.js
scripts.test: nodeunit test/lib/prepare/*-test.js test/lib/replicate/*-test.js test/lib/*-test.js test/*-test.js --reporter minimal
scripts.uglify:
uglifyjs dist/roy.js -c --preamble "/* roy.js 
 * `date --rfc-2822 --utc` 
 * (c) 2013 Johannes J. Schmidt, TF */" > dist/roy.min.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run build-js && npm run uglify
